name: Software Developer - InstaAstro Technologies Pvt. Ltd.

description.work: Designed, optimized, and maintained core backend systems powering critical platform functionality.
subWork: Redesigned the entire Login & Authentication system from scratch, improving security, validation flow, and overall reliability.

Developed an automated Bot Chat System to streamline internal operations and reduce manual workload.

description.work: Caching, Performance Optimization, and Database Efficiency Improvements
subWork: Implemented a platform-wide caching layer to optimize DB transactions, reducing overall DB usage from ~97% to ~20%.
Implemented API-level caching to reduce CPU utilization and improve response times.
Worked extensively with Redis and Redis Sentinel for high availability, failover, and load balancing.
Optimized several API endpoints to improve performance and reduce latency.

description.work: System Migration, Architecture Improvement, and Code Quality
subWork: Led migration of major backend components from Django to FastAPI to improve performance, scalability, and developer experience.
Designed internal Python libraries and reusable utilities for consistent use across the codebase.
Collaborated in code reviews, architecture discussions, and standardization of backend development practices.
